meta.reasoning: Completed comprehensive security analysis of password authentication flow. High confidence in security - all endpoints require authentication, bcrypt provides constant-time comparison, no hash injection vectors exist. Implemented first-time password change enforcement with blocking modal, password change in admin settings, CLI reset command. Updated all documentation (README, SETUP, SECURITY, ROADMAP). Closed Beads issue Facet-2jn.
